canregtools 0.2.8
  • Get started
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

All functions

add_labels()

Add variable labels for data set.

add_var_labels()

Add Variable Labels with Units

ageadjust()

Calculate the age standardized rate using the direct method

calc_age()

Calculate the actual age in completed years between two dates

canregs

Example Population-Based Cancer Registry Data (canregs)

check_canreg()

Check the class of 'canreg'

classify_areacode()

Classify codes for the administrative divisions of China

classify_areacode2()

Classify codes for the administrative divisions of China

classify_childhood()

Classify childhood cancer according to the ICCC3 standards

classify_icd10()

Classify ICD10 codes to cancer categories

count_canreg()

Count and classify canreg data

cr_clean()

Clean canreg data.

cr_filter()

Filter cases from objects of class canreg or canregs

cr_merge()

Merge elements from objects of class canregs, fbswicds, or asrs

cr_reframe()

Reframe data of class canregs or fbswicds

cr_select()

Select elements from objects with class "canregs", or "fbswicds"

cr_write()

Clean canreg data.

create_age_rate()

Calculate age specific rate

create_asr()

Calculate age-standardized rate (ASR)

create_quality()

Calculate quality indicators

create_report()

Render standardized cancer registry reports from built-in templates

cumrate()

Calculate the cumulative incidence or mortality rate

cumrisk()

Calculate the cumulative risk

cutage()

Group ages into categories

del_dict_files()

Delete a dictionary file from canregtools config

draw_barchart()

Draw Grouped Bar Charts with Facets

draw_dumbbell()

Plot dumbbell chart

draw_linechart()

Draw a Custom Line Chart Using Base R

draw_pyramid()

Plot a population pyramid

drop_others()

Drop “other” cancer codes

drop_total()

Drop the total cancer

esti_fbswicd()

Estimate object of fbswicd

esti_pop()

Estimating population structure using interpolation method.

expand_age_pop()

Expand population data from 5-year age groups to single-year ages

expand_lifetable()

Expand an five-year abridged life table to complete life table

ls_attrs()

list built-in attributes name used in cr_reframe()

ls_dict()

list dictionary used in package

ls_dict_files()

List dictionary files used by canregtools

ls_vars()

List variable names and their descriptions by category

lt()

Compute a life table from age-specific mortality rates

quality

Quality Indicators from the China Cancer Registry Annual Report

read_canreg()

Read cancer registration data

show_registry()

Get the areacodes of the registry

summary(<canreg>) summary(<canregs>)

Summary object of class 'canreg'

tidy_age()

Tidy age description

tidy_sex()

Tidy gender variable

tidy_var()

Reformat variable values for Cancer Registration in China

truncrate()

Calculate truncated age standardized rate

write_areacode()

Write custom six-digit administrative division codes to dictionary

write_registry()

Write registry attributes to a user-defined dictionary
